ReportText: EXAM: CHEST RADIOGRAPHY EXAM DATE: 06/24/2020 10:57 AM. CLINICAL HISTORY: Shortness of breath. COMPARISON: XR CHEST 1 VIEW AP/PA 06/23/2020 12:00 PM. TECHNIQUE: 1 view. FINDINGS: Lungs/Pleura: There is a persistent small to moderate left pleural effusion with associated left basilar consolidation. No right pleural effusion. No pneumothorax. Mediastinum: Within exam limitations, the cardiomediastinal contour is normal. Other: None. IMPRESSION: Small to moderate left pleural effusion with associated left basilar consolidation.
